releaseNotes: This release includes minor bug fixes, and we've laid down the foundations for cool upcoming features.
description:
Transform your finances with Curve – your super wallet for smarter spending. Travel freely without paying foreign exchange fees on any card in your Curve Wallet, saving up to 3% on every purchase abroad. Earn cashback on top of cashback or points you get with your cards for a double helping of rewards. Get more control over your money with the power to Go Back in Time® and switch purchases from one card to another. A tiny time machine in your pocket. 

Choose the Right Plan for You

• Curve Pay (Free): Simplify your money with all your cards in one, save up to 3% on fees abroad and enjoy cashback from brands you love. 
• Curve Pay X  Boost your benefits with free ATM withdrawals abroad and 1% cashback on all spending outside the UK & Europe, 
• Curve Pay Pro Take your savings  and earnings to a new level with 1% cashback at 6 retails of your choice, 1% cashback on all spending outside the UK & Europe, higher cashback rates from brands you love,  and higher fee-free spending+withdrawal limits abroad.
• Curve Pay Pro+ The ultimate Curve plan. Maximise your cashback with 1% cashback at 12 retailers of your choice. On top of 1% cashback on all spending outside the UK & Europe. Enjoy fee-free spending abroad with the highest limits, and travel like a V.I.P with discounted worldwide airport LoungeKey access.

Travel Light With All Your Cards in One
Curve connects your debit cards, credit cards and PayPal account into one physical card or digital wallet for shopping online and offline, anywhere in the world. Link your card to your phone or smartwatch for Apple Pay, Google Pay, Samsung Pay, Garmin Pay, FitBit, Xiaomi, SwatchPay, and more.

Travel Safe With a Shield Around Your Money
Your card numbers are never exposed with Curve, creating an invisible shield around your wallet. If your Curve card or device is ever lost, stolen or compromised, you can lock it instantly with one tap in the Curve Wallet. And even if it's lost for good, you only ever have to replace one card, not your whole wallet.

Unique Curve Features:

• Go Back in TimeⓇ: Move payments between cards up to 120 days after purchase (limits based on subscription tier)
• Anti-embarrassment mode: Never experience a card decline 
• Smart Rules: Automate your card choices for specific purchases e.g. always charge my credit card for purchases over £100
• Double-dip rewards: Stack cashback rewards on top of rewards you earn with your debit and credit cards
• Lock/unlock your whole wallet instantly in the Curve Wallet
• Keep all your bank and credit card numbers hidden

Compatible Cards & Devices:
You can link your Mastercard, Visa and Diners Club international cards to your Curve Wallet.

You need to be 18 years or older to sign up to Curve. 

*Terms and privacy policy apply at https://www.curve.com/en-gb/legal/. Free currency exchange is subject to limits and weekend charges. Cashback with selected retailers. Limits and exclusions apply to cashback. See terms for details.
